MEDICAL SCIENCE LIAISONWe are looking for a Medical Science Liaison to be employed in Medical Department, based in Istanbul with the following qualifications;University degree from Medicine or Pharmacy.

Fluent in Turkish & English

No travel restriction, intensive travel is anticipated.

Strong communication skills that include verbal, written and public presentations.

Ability to comprehend and interpret clinical and pre-clinical data.Job DescriptionEngaging with key thought-leaders, Health Care Professional, Regional/local institutions and organizations in the territory through appropriate high level scientific interaction .

Ensuring effective two-way communication across multi-functional teams in carrying out Medical Affairs strategy.

Providing comprehensive medical and scientific support in the company.
